title: How to Create Seasonal Marketing Campaigns
description: Run targeted campaigns that fill your calendar during peak seasons.
requirements: Knowledge of your seasonal peaks and valleys

steps.title: Map your seasonal opportunities
steps.description: Identify when customers need you most.
substeps: Spring: AC tune-ups, landscaping, exterior painting
Summer: HVAC repairs, deck work, outdoor projects
Fall: Heating prep, gutter cleaning, winterization
Winter: Emergency repairs, holiday lighting, indoor projects
List your services by season
steps.tip: Start campaigns 4-6 weeks before peak season to fill your calendar early.

steps.title: Use ChatGPT to create campaign messaging
substeps: Go to chat.openai.com
Try: 'Create a seasonal marketing campaign for a [trade] business for [season]. Include: email subject line, email body, social media post, and text message. Focus on [specific service].'
Review and personalize the content

steps.title: Create an early-bird offer
substeps: Example: 'Book your spring AC tune-up by March 15, save 15%'
Early booking fills slow periods and improves cash flow
Create urgency: Limited slots, deadline, or quantity
ChatGPT can write compelling offer copy for you

steps.title: Schedule your multi-channel campaign
substeps: Week 1: Email announcement to past customers
Week 1: Social media posts (Facebook, Instagram, Nextdoor)
Week 2: Follow-up email to non-openers
Week 2: Text message to your best customers
steps.tip: The same message in different channels dramatically increases response.

steps.title: Add a personal touch
steps.description: Mass campaigns feel better when personalized.
substeps: Use first names in emails
Reference their last service if you can
Send from your name, not just the business name
For VIP customers, add a handwritten note or personal call

steps.title: Track and improve
steps.description: Learn what works for next year.
substeps: Track: How many opened, clicked, booked
Note which channel performed best
Save your successful campaigns for next year
Test different offers to see what resonates

successMessage: Your seasonal campaign is ready! Early booking fills your calendar and smooths out cash flow.
proTips: Create a seasonal campaign calendar at the start of each year

Combine seasonal with referral: 'Refer a friend and you both get spring cleaning 15% off'
